name: lazyvids
description: A small utility to lazy-load autoplay HTML5 videos once they enter the viewport.
author: isAdrisal

scripts.build: yarn clean && mkdir -p dist && yarn build:es5 && yarn build:es6
scripts.build:es5: babel src/lazyvids.js --out-file dist/lazyvids.es5.min.js && terser dist/lazyvids.es5.min.js -o dist/lazyvids.es5.min.js
